ETYMOLOGY: From Middle English 'memberschipe', formed from 'member' (from Old French 'membre', ultimately from Latin 'membrum' meaning 'limb, part of a body') + the suffix '-ship' (denoting state, condition, or quality).

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), or to name a particular one of these (proper noun).
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: The state or condition of being a member of a group, organization, or club.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 成为某个团体、组织或俱乐部的成员的身份或状态。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: We offer various benefits with a full membership in our club.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 我们为俱乐部全面会员提供各种福利。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), or to name a particular one of these (proper noun).
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: All the members of a group, organization, or club, considered collectively.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 某个团体、组织或俱乐部的所有成员的总称。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The club's membership has grown significantly this year.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 俱乐部今年的会员人数显著增长。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), or to name a particular one of these (proper noun).
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A document or card proving that one is a member, or the period for which one is a member.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 证明会员身份的文件或卡片，或者作为会员的有效期限。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: Your gym membership expires next month.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 您的健身房会员资格下个月到期。
